title: Garlic and Anchovy Dip with Vegetables
directions: Heat first 4 ingredients in heavy medium skillet over low heat until butter melts and mixture simmers, about 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to flameproof bowl. Place over candle or canned heat burner. Serve with vegetables.
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, cut into strips
1 yellow bell pepper, cut into strips
10 celery stalks, cut in half crosswise
